SELECT ic.cart_num, t.cate_parent, t.cate_name, i.items_photo1, i.items_name, i.items_price, ic.quantity, i.items_quantity,
ic.quantity * i.items_price as items_total
FROM item_cart ic JOIN items i ON ic.items_num=i.items_num JOIN items_cate t ON i.cate_num=t.cate_num WHERE ic.mem_num=#{mem_num} ORDER BY ic.cart_num DESC
